articles.title: EU To Present Law That Forces iPhones To Use USB-C Next Month - Lowyat.NET
articles.description: The Lightning connector is ubiquitous to Apple products. And particularly the iPhone, since the iPad Pros already use USB-C. But the European Commission is expected to present new legislation to force the brand to adopt the universal standard. The legislation…
